attributes.review:
i downloaded this app to show my president trumpiepoo 😻 some love and respect after all those blue haired libtards ruined his tulsa rally, but as soon as i opened it i heard a knock at my door, so i walked over and opened it. standing in front of me was a small gnome man with very orange skin and a terrible blond wig, out of pure shock and fear i kicked him into my bushes. he then climbed out of them and started chanting “MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN” along with racist and homophobic slurs while charging at me. i quickly shut my door and ran as far as i could up the stairs into my bed room, i then heard the terrible sound of the little gnome man biting through my door. i quickly locked my bedroom door and hid under my trump 2020 flag. he then started climbing up my stairs and got to my bedroom door, i could hear him breathing very heavily as he licked my door then he started chewing through it. he then stuck his head through the hole he had made and began hissing and starring at me with his red deathly eyes. he then opened his mouth as wide as possible and what looked like millions of termites crawled out of his throat. i was afraid to death so i reached into my pocket to grab my phone and call 911 (cause i’m a white woman and they won’t hurt me even though white privilege doesn’t exist duh) but i accidentally deleted this app as i was panicking, but as soon as i did the gnome man turned to dust and i was safe. but a few weeks later my house fell apart due to all the termites so now i’m living under my neighbors deck. 

i rate this app 1/10 😡😾
trump 2020 🇱🇷🇱🇷🇱🇷
make the ❄️s cry again 😹😹🤣🤣
attributes.title: very rude little gnome man😡🔪
